paragraph.paragraph:
The address bar of the context tool has a different look from the
10_main_address_bar.xml main address bar , but provides the same functionality.

It also contains history arrows, and by clicking on the cluster, class or feature name, a window is popped up that contains fields similar to the ones of the
10_main_address_bar.xml main address bar , except that a cluster can also be entered, since the diagram tool and the metrics also work with clusters:
paragraph.tip: Tip: Labels in this address bar are pickable, to send the address to other tools easily.
paragraph.note: Note: The context tool only has an address bar if it is unlinked from the editor.
